00001 /**
00002  * \file RandomType.hpp
00003  * \brief Class to hold bit-width and unsigned type
00004  *
00005  * This provides a simple class to couple a bit-width and an unsigned type
00006  * capable of holding all the bits.  In addition is offers static methods for
00007  * I/O and checksumming.
00008  *
00009  * Copyright (c) Charles Karney (2006-2011) <charles@karney.com> and licensed
00010  * under the MIT/X11 License.  For more information, see
00011  * http://randomlib.sourceforge.net/
00012  **********************************************************************/
00013 #if !defined(RANDOMLIB_RANDOMTYPE_HPP)
00014 #define RANDOMLIB_RANDOMTYPE_HPP \
00015   "$Id: 78af0ac2ace53dc561a7a6942d370e3e38d8ca2c $"
00016 
00017 #include <limits>
00018 #include <string>
00019 #include <iostream>
00020 
00021 namespace RandomLib {
00022   /**
00023    * \brief Class to hold bit-width and unsigned type
00024    *
00025    * This provides a simple class to couple a bit-width and an unsigned type
00026    * capable of holding all the bits.  In addition is offers static methods for
00027    * I/O and checksumming.
00028    *
00029    * @tparam bits the number of significant bits.
00030    * @tparam UIntType the C++ unsigned integer type capable of holding the bits.
00031    **********************************************************************/
00032   template<int bits, typename UIntType>
00033   class RANDOM_EXPORT RandomType {
00034   public:
00035     /**
00036      * The unsigned C++ type
00037      **********************************************************************/
00038     typedef UIntType type;
00039     /**
00040      * The number of significant bits
00041      **********************************************************************/
00042     static const unsigned width = bits;
00043     /**
00044      * A mask for the significant bits.
00045      **********************************************************************/
00046     static const type mask =
00047       ~type(0) >> (std::numeric_limits<type>::digits - width);
00048     /**
00049      * The minimum representable value
00050      **********************************************************************/
00051     static const type min = type(0);
00052     /**
00053      * The maximum representable value
00054      **********************************************************************/
00055     static const type max = mask;
00056     /**
00057      * A combined masking and casting operation
00058      *
00059      * @tparam IntType the integer type of the \e x.
00060      * @param[in] x the input integer.
00061      * @return the masked and casted result.
00062      **********************************************************************/
00063     template<typename IntType> static type cast(IntType x) throw()
00064     { return type(x) & mask; }
00065     /**
00066      * Read a data value from a stream of 32-bit quantities (binary or text)
00067      *
00068      * @param[in,out] is the input stream.
00069      * @param[in] bin true if the stream is binary.
00070      * @param[out] x the data value read from the stream.
00071      **********************************************************************/
00072     static void Read32(std::istream& is, bool bin, type& x);
00073     /**
00074      * Write the data value to a stream of 32-bit quantities (binary or text)
00075      *
00076      * @param[in,out] os the output stream.
00077      * @param[in] bin true if the stream is binary.
00078      * @param[in,out] cnt controls the use of spaces and newlines for text
00079      *   output.
00080      * @param[in] x the data value to be written to the stream.
00081      *
00082      * \e cnt should be zero on the first invocation of a series of writes.
00083      * This function increments it by one on each call.
00084      **********************************************************************/
00085     static void Write32(std::ostream& os, bool bin, int& cnt, type x);
00086     /**
00087      * Accumulate a checksum of a integer into a 32-bit check.  This implements
00088      * a very simple checksum and is intended to avoid accidental corruption
00089      * only.
00090      *
00091      * @param[in] n the number to be included in the checksum.
00092      * @param[in,out] check the running checksum.
00093      **********************************************************************/
00094     static void CheckSum(type n, uint32_t& check) throw();
00095   };
00096 
00097   /**
00098    * The standard unit for 32-bit quantities
00099    **********************************************************************/
00100   typedef RandomType<32, uint32_t> Random_u32;
00101   /**
00102    * The standard unit for 64-bit quantities
00103    **********************************************************************/
00104   typedef RandomType<64, uint64_t> Random_u64;
00105 
00106   /**
00107    * The integer type of constructing bitsets.  This used to be unsigned long.
00108    * C++0X has made this unsigned long long.
00109    **********************************************************************/
00110 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && _MSC_VER >= 1600
00111   typedef unsigned long long bitset_uint_t;
00112 #else
00113   typedef unsigned long bitset_uint_t;
00114 #endif
00115 
00116   /// \cond SKIP
00117 
00118   // Accumulate a checksum of a 32-bit quantity into check
00119   template<>
00120   inline void Random_u32::CheckSum(Random_u32::type n, Random_u32::type& check)
00121     throw() {
00122     // Circular shift left by one bit and add new word.
00123     check = (check << 1 | (check >> 31 & Random_u32::type(1))) + n;
00124     check &= Random_u32::mask;
00125   }
00126 
00127   // Accumulate a checksum of a 64-bit quantity into check
00128   template<>
00129   inline void Random_u64::CheckSum(Random_u64::type n, Random_u32::type& check)
00130     throw() {
00131     Random_u32::CheckSum(Random_u32::cast(n >> 32), check);
00132     Random_u32::CheckSum(Random_u32::cast(n      ), check);
00133   }
00134   /// \endcond
00135 
00136 } // namespace RandomLib
00137 
00138 #endif  // RANDOMLIB_RANDOMTYPE_HPP
